Class MqttHomeAssistant

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ubtrobot.mini.speech.framework.demo.MqttHomeAssistant

  • public class MqttHomeAssistant
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to send and receive MQTT messages from Home Assistant.
